title: Portfolio using Angular
desc:
Made the portfolio that you're seeing here on my site using Angular. Initially I started this project with using Python and Django, but soon came to realize that deploying a Django-app was not supported by the 'basic' web hotel I had..

With a little time off from the project, I came to realize that not only was this thing called Angular supported by the web hotel, it was also more sought after in the industry. As such, I soon after started learning Angular and 'ported' everything I had already made in Django to this new framework.

From the introductory course to Angular on skrimba.com and this project I learned all the basics of Angular; Angular CLI, modules, components, services, pipes, routing, event- and data binding, directives etc.
